DOC.brief_summary: In different case intraocular pressure ( IOP ) measure lying position . Therefore lot portable tonometer establish . The Icare Pro new tonometer market allow faster comfortable IOP-measurements . No local anesthesia need , major advantage patient . In study investigator want evaluate IOP measurement Icare Pro Tonometer reliable establish portable tonometer ( Perkins , TONO-Pen hand held-Dynamic Contour Tonometer ) . - Trial medical device
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Different Portable Tonometers ( Icare Pro , TONO-Pen AVIA , Perkins Tonometer , PASCAL Hand Held Dynamic Contour Tonometer )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : healthy patient least 18 year age Exclusion criterion : diagnosis glaucoma optic neuropathy corneal disorder make IOP measurement impossible
